The resurgence of populism and nationalism threatens to destroy the dream made real. The indifference of many pro-Europeans is also a risk.
Europe must now find a fresh impetus in a new rapprochement, the coming together between the people of Europe and the European Union.
Europe is a daily reality for more than 500 million Europeans and yet the public opinion is fragmented mainly along national borders.
Culture is a core value and a strong unifying element in European integration.
The European Union is fundamentally a political and cultural project based on strong humanist values.
We won’t have real unity until we acknowledge a sense of shared European destiny which we are ready to work together to achieve.
Europe needs your talent to tell our story, to perpetuate our collective memory and to articulate this destiny which we all share.

I have a deep appreciation and respect that we owe to a generation that yesterday taught and trained us as good men and women.
Also in San Juan Pueblo and I met with settlers and authorities of Sparta, La Masica and Arizona by telluric movements that affected them.
We reiterate to our compatriots that they have the guarantee that we will respond to their needs.
